title: Only Be Me
lyrics:
They're calling out my name from inside the room
I can look tough, but I don't think they'll notice
The girl on the train looked kinda cute
And I don't know what to say
Open all my doors

But it is hard to face the truth

So I'm trying to remember what it is I always do



When I'm with you

I can only be me

When I'm with you

I can only be me

When I'm with you

I can only be me

When I'm with you

I can only be me

(you you you you you you you)

When I'm with you

I can only be me

I can only be me'

I can only be me

I can only be me



Open all my doors

But it is hard to face the truth

So I'm trying to remember what it is I always do
